maqras.text: 26|181|Pajmonaro tamom ʙidihed va kamfurusi nakuned
26|182|Va ʙo tarozui durust vazn kuned
26|183|Va koloi mardumro kam nadihed [va haqqasonro zoe' nakuned] va dar zamin ʙa fasod [va taʙohi] nakused
26|184|Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
26|185|Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|186|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
26|187|Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
26|188|[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
26|189|Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
26|190|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|191|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|192|Va ʙa rosti, [in] Qur'on furufiristodai Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|193|Ruhu-l-amin [Caʙrail] onro furud ovardaast
26|194|Bar qalʙi tu [nozil kardaast], to ʙimdihanda ʙosi
26|195|[Qur'onro] Ba zaʙoni araʙii ravsan [nozil namud]
26|196|Va ʙe tardid, [ʙasorati nuzuli] on dar kitoʙhoi pesinijon [niz omada] ast
26|197|Ojo hamin nisona ʙarojason kofi nest, ki ulamoi Bani Isroil az [haqiqati] Qur'on ogohand
26|198|Va agar onro ʙar ʙa'ze az ƣajriaraʙho nozil mekardem
26|199|Va [pajomʙar] onro ʙarojason mexond, ʙa on imon nameovardand
26|200|[Ore] In guna on [kufru takziʙ]-ro dar dilhoi gunahgoron coj dodem
26|201|Ammo ʙa on imon nameovarand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardnokro ʙuʙinand
26|202|Pas, nogahon dar hole ki ʙexaʙarand, ʙa suroƣason meojad
26|203|Pas, [dar on hol] megujand: “Ojo muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] xohem dost?”
26|204|Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
26|205|Ojo donisti, ki agar ononro solho [az zindagii dunjo] ʙahramand sozem
26|206|Sipas on ci ki ʙa onon va'da doda sudaast, ʙa suroƣasonn ʙijojad
26|207|In ʙahramandiason [az dunjo dar hangomi azoʙ] sude ʙarojason naxohad dost
26|208|Va Mo [sokinoni] hec sahrero halok nakardem, magar in ki husdordihandagone [az pajomʙaron] dostand
26|209|To ononro pand dihand va Mo hargiz sitamgor naʙudaem [ki itmomi huccat nakunem]
26|210|Va in Qur'onro sajotin nozil nakardaand
26|211|Onon na darxuri in korand va na tavonasro dorand
26|212|Be tardid, onon az sunidani [vahj] ʙarkanorand
26|213|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] hec ma'ʙudero ʙo Alloh taolo maxon, ki azoʙ xohi sud
26|214|Va xesovandoni nazdikatro [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙim deh
26|215|Va ʙo mu'minone, ki az tu pajravi kardaand, mehruʙon [-u furutan] ʙos
26|216|Pas, agar az [farmoni] tu sarpeci kardand, ʙigu: “Ba rosti, man az on ci mekuned, ʙezoram”
26|217|Va ʙar [Allohi] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon tavakkal kun
26|218|Hamon ki cun [ʙaroi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, turo meʙinad
26|219|Va harakat [va nisastu ʙarxosti] turo mijoni sacdakunandagon [meʙinad]
26|220|Be tardid, U hamon sunavoi donost
26|221|Ojo ʙa sumo xaʙar diham, ki sajotin ʙar ci kase nozil mesavand
26|222|Bar har duruƣgui gunahkor
26|223|Onon sunidahoe [-ro, ki duzdona az malakut gus dodaand, ʙa codugaron va folgiron] ilqo mekunand va ʙestarason duruƣgu hastand
26|224|Va [Muhammad soir nest, zero] soironro gumrohon pajravi mekunand
26|225|Ojo nadidi, ki onon dar har laƣvu ʙehudae [hajronu] sargastaand
26|226|Va cizero megujand, ki [xud ʙa on e'tiqod nadorand va] amal namekunand

26|227|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand va Allohro ʙisjor jod kardaand va pas az on ki sitam didand, intiqom giriftand [va ʙo se'ri xud az islomu muslimin difo' namudand] va kasone, ki sitam kardand, ʙa zudi xohand donist, ʙa ci ʙozgastgohe ʙozmegardand
